Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. This product is not just an item, it's an experience that adds value to your daily life. Given its unique features and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than what most people are willing to pay. However, I understand everyone has their own valuation, so I'm extending this opportunity to you for $95. I trust this price reflects the true value while also making it accessible for you. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
